Package au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util

Class NumberRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util.NumberRange
  • public class NumberRange
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods to format number ranges as Strings. "Infinite" numbers are replaced by a String, e.g. "MinInteger", "MaxDouble", etc...
    Author:
    Shayne Flint - 4/4/2012

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NumberRange()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String range​(double min, double max)
      Return a range of doubles, e.g. 1.15..57.00
      static java.lang.String range​(float min, float max)
      Return a range of floats, e.g. 1.0..57.87
      static java.lang.String range​(int min, int max)
      Return a range of integers, e.g. 1..57.
      static java.lang.String range​(long min, long max)
      Return a range of longs, e.g. 153711321244687..5768914546187981434687

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
